title: "BE" in Akzidenz Grotesk BE and other unknown acronyms
content:
What does "BE" stand for in Akzidenz Grotesk BE, and what's the difference between BE and BQ in the AG Collection?

Thanks.
author: katienlee

comments.content: "BE" is "Berthold Exklusivs", "BQ" is "Berthold Quality". I think the former were those typefaces once included in Adobe's Font Folio.
